## CredentialPlugin.matchKeyForJWT() method

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

Checks if a key is suitable for signing JWT payloads.

**Signature:**

```typescript
matchKeyForJWT(key: IKey, context: IssuerAgentContext): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                     | Description                           |
| --------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------- |
| key       | [IKey](./core-types.ikey.md)                             | the key to check                      |
| context   | [IssuerAgentContext](./core-types.issueragentcontext.md) | the Veramo agent context, unused here |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;
